repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:xenial

RUN adduser --disabled-password --gecos '' ctf

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y xinetd gcc make libc6-dev-i386 libssl-dev coreutils && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

WORKDIR /home/ctf
ADD src/* /home/ctf/
RUN make
RUN chown -R root:root .

ADD easyshell.xinetd /etc/xinetd.d/easyshell

USER root
EXPOSE 5253

CMD service xinetd restart && sleep infinity
